### Initialize() {#a771bc7cbf479a57b8cf0f64d01a7deb3}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Initialize the extension for parsing using the given <code>Parser</code>.

The extension should use the AsmParser interfaces to register its parsing routines.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/xcoffasmparser-cpp/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/lib/mc/mcparser/xcoffasmparser-cpp">XCOFFAsmParser.cpp</a>.
